Text.Page:
Got a big one for you! Thulsa's using mutants to harry our forces.

Engage {@LinkCreature:40#23#guardian aberrations}, {@LinkCreature:40#19#mutant polykinds}, {@LinkCreature:40#15#mutant workers}, {@LinkCreature:40#28#Turakius}, and {@LinkCreature:40#30#mutant tribladers} from the Blighted Village.

Report to Tirlotta near Blighted Village when you're done killing.
Excellent work. Culling our foes will make reclamation efforts proceed with greater safety.
There are still too many aberrations and mutants around the Blighted Village. Proceed with your mission.
